name: Maia.exe
description:
Description:

Maia.exe is a short story where you will get tested as an A.I by Maia. It can be completed in under 15 minutes but there is no need to hurry, take as much as you want.

FAQ:

How do I play in fullscreen?

A: You can press F1. Although fullscreen might look a bit blurry.

Which version should I play?

A: You should try the normal one. Borderless is for a bit more immersion.

Controls?

A: Besides inputing your name at the start, the whole game can be played only with the mouse.

Linux? MacOS?

A: It should work on linux if you use something like Bottles/Crossover etc. MacOS? Yeah, ain't happening. Sorry.

Credits:

Music by White Bat Audio.
